statements: UPDATE resource_utilization SET cpu_utilization=60.5, memory_utilization=40.7 WHERE id=1;

UPDATE resource_utilization SET billing_amount = 1200.45, storage_utilization = 50 WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01';

UPDATE billing_information SET billing_amount = 100.50, billing_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE user_id = 101;

UPDATE customer_information SET email = 'newemail@example.com', phone_number = '9876543210' WHERE customer_id = 1001;

UPDATE resource_utilization SET resource_name='Updated Resource 1', usage_start_date='2022-01-01', usage_end_date='2022-01-31' WHERE resource_id=1;

UPDATE resource_utilization SET resource_name = 'Updated Resource Name', usage_start_date = '2022-01-01 10:00:00', usage_end_date = '2022-01-05 15:00:00' WHERE resource_id = 1;
UPDATE customer_accounts SET address = '123 Main Street, New York', phone_number = '555-555-5555', email = 'updated@email.com', customer_name = 'Updated Customer Name' WHERE account_id = 2;
UPDATE resources SET resource_status='Active' WHERE resource_id=1;
UPDATE customers SET customer_phone='123-456-7890', customer_email='newemail@example.com' WHERE customer_id=2;
UPDATE resources SET resource_status = 'Active' WHERE resource_id = 101;
UPDATE billing_details SET total_amount = total_amount + 100.50 WHERE bill_id = 201;
